description:
The Multi-channel Digital Tax Platform (MDTP) employs Continuous Delivery at scale.

In this talk Ben explains how this has allowed HM Revenue and Customs to meet the urgent demands of Covid-19

**
Ben's talk will be followed by a Virtual Fishbowl session where all attendees will have the opportunity to take part in a live discussion
**

SPEAKER:

Ben Conrad is the Head of Agile Delivery for MDTP at HM Revenue & Customs
title: How the MDTP has supported HMRC's successful launch of Covid-19 services
